channel.title: Route on Hopton 10k road and trail running race, Mirfield, West Yorkshire
channel.description: Recent content in Route on Hopton 10k road and trail running race, Mirfield, West Yorkshire

item.title: Walking the route
item.description: Never take under kids on a 10k walk without snacks! Today I decided it was a ‘good idea’ to take the whole family out to walk the Hopton 10k route. It turns out the 10k undulating route feels a lot longer when you’re listening to kids complaining about being tired and carrying a toddler for 60% of the time. However, we made it, and we picked several key areas to place marshals and signage.
